text: "Tender Is the Night" is a 1983 song by Jackson Browne. It is the second single from his seventh studio album Lawyers in Love. It went to number 25 in the United States and the music video features Daryl Hannah and was also released as a single from the United Kingdom and Germany. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Jackson Browne songs
title: Tender Is the Night (song)
